Tony, I wrote an example of doing this in a two step process as part  
of t=
he book I coauthored:  http://www.packtpub.com/solr-1-4-enterprise-search-s=
erver 
.  It is in Chapter 8, and talks about Heritrix and SolrJ.

The code=
 is wrapped up in an Amazon EC2 instance called "solrbook- 
packtpub" as we=
ll as on Packt's site.


Eric


On Sep 15, 2009, at 6:25 PM, Tony Wang wrot=
e:

> I asked this question on this list months ago, but still haven't got =
 
> any definitive answer yet. Is there any available code to integrate  
>=
 Heritrix with Solr to build an online search engine?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Tony
